text: KTJZ (97.5 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Tallulah, Louisiana. The station is owned by Mid South Communications Company, Inc., and airs an urban contemporary format. The station was assigned the KTJZ call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on March 10, 2005. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * FCC Public Inspection File for KTJZ * Category:Radio stations in Louisiana Category:Radio stations established in 2007 Category:2007 establishments in Louisiana Category:Urban contemporary radio stations in the United States Category:Madison Parish, Louisiana
title: KTJZ
